p: The biodiesel higher heating value (HHV) was measured before and after the AOM assay for the blank and the samples with antioxidant. For this, the isoperibolic method was performed using an IKA-Werke C2000 Basic ® calorimeter (IKA-Werke, Wilmington, DE, USA) at 25 °C with 3 MPa oxygen pressure. The pure extract higher heating value was also determined. The entire assay was performed by triplicate.
